scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate:generate --if-present && npm run migrate --if-present && nodemon --ext ts,tsx,js,json,yaml,yml --watch '**/*' index.ts
scripts.start:dev:docker: NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate:generate --if-present && npm run migrate --if-present && nodemon --exitcrash --ext ts,tsx,js,json,yaml,yml --watch '**/*' index.ts
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate --if-present && ts-node --transpile-only index.ts
scripts.migrate:db:messages: cross-env-shell DATABASE_URL=$(npx kap-mongodb-url messages) prisma db push --schema ./db/messages/schema.prisma
scripts.reset:db:messages: cross-env-shell DATABASE_URL=$(npx kap-mongodb-url messages) prisma db push --force-reset --schema=./db/messages/schema.prisma
